workflow_description: Multilingual health assistant system with medicine scanner and personalized health guidance

nodes.label: Medimart Medicine Scanner
nodes.description: Lightweight agent that extracts medicine name from scanned strips, matches with stored data, returns structured info (name, use, warnings). No conversation, no personalization - factual output only.

nodes.label: Medimart Health Assistant
nodes.description: Multilingual health guide providing symptom guidance, medicine explanations, and personalized risk assessment based on user profile (age, pregnancy status, allergies). Uses calm, non-technical language with extra caution for pregnant users. Never prescribes medicines or dosages.
nodes.trigger: Send in Chat Interface, Auto (after Scanner output)

knowledge_base.name: Medimart Medicine Database
knowledge_base.description: Comprehensive medicine database containing common medicines information, pregnancy warnings, health tips in Hindi and English
